features: 【1080P Streaming Webcam】The Full HD webcam can support 1080P 30fps video capture, photo definition max support 1920x1080 . With smooth motion and crisp details, W302 Webcam specifically designed and optimized for Professional quality video streaming on social gaming and entertainment sites.

【Automatically Adapt To Light】Automatic low-light correction technology is applied in 120° wide angle 1080P HD webcam so that the PC camera could capture the image in dim light. W302 PC webcam also has low-light boost, color boost and adjust exposures, so it can ensures a clear face even in low light or backlit conditions.

【Noise-cancelling microphone】The built-in noise-canceling microphones pick up your voice up to 3m/10ft distance and filter out background noise automatically to enhance the sound quality of your video. You will never worry about background noise ruining video calls. Very suitable for webinars, video conferences , online courses,daily video calling and live streaming.

【Plug and Play】This USB webcam can be easily set up with USB connector, you can plug and play.This PC external webcam can be compatible with the current popular video/meeting softwares.Provide excellent quality video streaming on social gaming and social media such as Facebook, Twitch , Skype ,You Tube.

【Widely Compatible】With Advanced H.264 video compression technology, record and compress at the same time, it provides faster and smoother uploads and streaming with less demand on your computer.Compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10, Mac OS 10.6 and above, Linux 2.6/2.4 and above and other major systems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Plug & Play This USB webcam can be easily set up with USB connector, you can plug and play. This PC external webcam can be compatible with the current popular video/meeting softwares. Provide excellent quality video streaming on social gaming and social media such as Facebook, Twitch , Skype ,You Tube. Being a universal used video chatting equipment, you can use this computer camera on major popular video software like Facebook, YouTube, Skype, Zoom, Face Time and others. For the operating devices, this webcam supports Windows XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/ Windows 10, Mac OS, Android Smart TV and other major systems.

4-Layer Glass Coated Lenses Omnidirectional sound absorption and noise reduction microphone, pick up your voice and filter out background noise automatically, enabling you to enjoy clearer voice for hassle-free communication. Designed with a high-level lens, this webcam gives an excellent image quality at a HD 1080P resolution. It can reach up to 30 fps which makes that so easy to see every detail clearly and smoothly. If the lens is out of focus during shipping, you could manually rotate the lens to adjust the clarity.

Manual Focus Lens After the sharpness is adjusted to the best.it is stable and does not need to be adjusted frequently. With the 90° and 180° rotatable clip, you can easily adjust the angel of the webcam's clip and the lens to fit your computer well.
